channel.title: Ironminer banker and the best antirandoms available
channel.description:
can someone send me the script or a link to a script? because i cannot find 1 (free) iron miner+banker that works and has the best anti randoms (work against lost pickaxes, rick turpines, etc)
anyone know such a script?

item.title: Ironminer banker and the best antirandoms available
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Heroic:

You all are freakin noobs, i’ll make you the script. BUT YOU HAVE TO GIVE ME THE COLORS

Are you serious…Making the script is the hard part, and you say all you need are colors? Do you know how stupid that sounds…Your a freakin noob if you think you can make a script like this if we just give you the colors. The only color you will need is the color of the iron rock…your saying if i give you that, you will make a perfect varrok miner?

Read full topic

item.title: Ironminer banker and the best antirandoms available
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“shortkid, post:1, topic:82051”]can someone send me the script or a link to a script? because i cannot find 1 (free) iron miner+banker that works and has the best anti randoms
(work against lost pickaxes, rick turpines, etc)

anyone know such a script?[/quote]
Use Pentii’s Multi City Miner and Banker. It is located in the SRL forums under the SRL Free Scripts in the mining section. Try there.

Read full topic
